author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: United Engineers (Singapore) Pte Ltd v Lee Lip Hiong and Others
counsel: Andre Yeap SC and Adrian Wong (Rajah and Tann) for plaintiff / appellant; Foo Yuk Lin (Foo Chia Partnership) for first defendant / respondent; H T Sam (H T Sam and Co) for second and third defendant / respondents
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Pleadings/Amendment/Whether amendment of pleadings postponed deemed closure of pleadings thereby extending time limit for summary judgment application/Order 18 r 20(1) Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 2004 Rev Ed)

Civil Procedure/Summary judgment/Whether time bar for taking out of summary judgment application absolute/Whether time limit could be extended by court or by consent of parties/Order 3 r 4(3), O 14 r 14, O 92 r 4 Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 2004 Rev Ed)
